titleStmt.title: The complaint of a Christian soule Containing certaine remedies and comforts against the trouble and conflict of conscience. Newlie written in meter.
titleStmt.author: Muschet, George, poet.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Charters [sic], printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie,
